metadata.title: North Pacific Pelagic Seabird Database

creators.name: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Alaska Biological Science Center, Biological Resources Division

metadata.description: To provide a tool for mapping and analyzing data on the distribution and abundance of seabirds at sea in Alaska and the North Pacific.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide a tool for mapping and analyzing data on the distribution and abundance of seabirds at sea in Alaska and the North Pacific.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: As Needed

Access constraints: Data  available on request, usually within 2 days. See abstract for other comments on accessibility.

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
